title: 17th October 1814: London Beer Flood kills eight people when nearly one and a half million litres of beer sweep out of the Horse Shoe Brewery
itunes:summary: Once the beer began to pour into the street, it quickly began to fill the cellars of nearby houses in which families lived, killing eight ...
